CustomField.formula: CASE( Email_Quality__c, "*", IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_100.gif", "1 star"), "**", IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_200.gif", "2 stars"), "***", IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_300.gif", "3 stars"), "****", IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_400.gif", "4 stars"), "*****", IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "5 stars"), "FW", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error16.png", "FRAUD") + " FRAUD WARNING", "ST", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error16.png", "SPAM") + " POSSIBLE SPAM TRAP", "BA", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error16.png", "BOUNCE") + " POSSIBLE BOUNCE ALERT", "HB", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/error16.png", "HARD BOUNCE") + " HARD BOUNCE ALERT", IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_000.gif", "no rating") )
CustomField.label: Email Quality Score
